properties.tune: If I Were A Rich Man

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: All day long I'd sit upon my throne, Watching all the peasants carry on. Ha.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: If I were a princess- La Da Da Da Da Da etc. There would be a dozen virile knights Fighting for my favor and my song.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: They'd come to court and give me all sorts of presents Trinkets and lovely things to eat. Then they'd bow and curtsey when I pass by. They'd work so hard to please me hoping that I would Tell them that their lives were now complete. But I'd just keep them groveling at my feet. Ha!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: But since I'm not a princess- La Da Da Da Da Da etc. No one ever looks my way, I'm the one who toils night and day And I'll never hear the gentles say, "Oh, your highness have a lovely day."
